snippet: Grand ambitions to restore the country’s run-down train services to their former glory have been impeded by Islamic State’s advances.
abstract: Grand ambitions to restore Iraq’s run-down train services to their former glory have been impeded by Islamic State’s advances around the country.

byline.contributor: Omar Al-Jawoshy and Falih Hassan contributed reporting from Baghdad and Basra.

lead_paragraph: Grand ambitions to restore the country’s run-down train services to their former glory have been impeded by Islamic State’s advances.

headline.main: A Train Ride Through Time: From Iraq’s Checkered Past Into an Uncertain Future
headline.print_headline: A Train Ride Through Time: From Iraq’s Checkered Past Into an Uncertain Future
